titleStmt.title: The resoluer; or Curiosities of nature written in French by Scipio Du Plesis counseller and historiographer to the French King. Vsefull & pleasant for all
Curiosité naturelle. English
titleStmt.author: Dupleix, Scipion, 1569-1661.
Marshall, William, fl. 1617-1650, engraver.

notesStmt.note: A translation of: La curiosité naturelle.
The title page is engraved and signed: W. Marshall. sculpsit.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
